descripcion: Kiwi (Actinidia deliciosa var. deliciosa C. Liang and A. R. Ferguson) is a climbing deciduous dioecious brush (separate sexes in male and female plants), that produces a berry type fruit with numerous seeds and that live for many years (perennial plant, commercial plantings can produce over 20 years).
